statement.p: Out of the last 50 days, it rained 13 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{13}}{{50}}={0.26}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.26}={26} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 26 .
